reviewText:
What can I say about this show? Well, I would say that it is one of the best shows out there. I was hooked to "Rizzoli & Isles" from the very first episode.  The show has two very strong leading ladies that I have adored from their previous works.  Angie Harmon and Sasha Alexander are Jane Rizzoli and Maura Isles.

So if you are interested into crime drama, I highly recommend "Rizzoli & Isles".
